changelog_entries.title: Update seasonal artwork to "new beginnings" contest winners
Use generic Enum and CreateDelegate methods
Use StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries in string.Split() when possible
Fix incorrect accuracy display on overall ranking view
Add keywords to ease search of "first object visibility" setting
Fix android project not getting correct versioning information
changelog_entries.message: Allows us to release android builds again!
changelog_entries.message_html: Allows us to release android builds again!

changelog_entries.title: Fix `osu.ppy.sh` links no longer opening in-game
Fix android crash when using non-Gregorian calendars
Fix clients not reconnecting after a connection error
Retrofit lazer scoring data onto `.osr` files
changelog_entries.message: This retrofits a minimal subset of scoring data that is required by lazer in order to properly show scores to the end of `.osr` files. This leaves the files backwards compatible with osu-stable should you choose to import a lazer replay into it, and also perhaps the path for us to potentially show lazer scores in stable?
changelog_entries.message_html: This retrofits a minimal subset of scoring data that is required by lazer in order to properly show scores to the end of .osr files. This leaves the files backwards compatible with osu-stable should you choose to import a lazer replay into it, and also perhaps the path for us to potentially show lazer scores in stable?

Fix buttons in setting overlay receiving input outside the visible corners
Fix WhitePixel texture rectangle doesn't respect provided area
Bring Android framework to .NET 6
Update SDL2
Fix search container filtering too much
Fix changelog single build dates disappearing before being off screen
Store maximum statistics to spectator state
Fix one more case of using AutoGen's `ffmpeg` class for constants
Guard against attempting to call `OpenUrlExternally` with non-http content
Allow keeping stream open after encoding scores
Always hide cursor in osu!catch gameplay
Fix buttons receiving input outside the content
Add score token to `BeginPlaySession()`
Only show local results in multi-spectator results screen
changelog_entries.message: Was previously showing local results as if it was a non-multiplayer display.
changelog_entries.message_html: Was previously showing local results as if it was a non-multiplayer display.

changelog_entries.title: Add description for lazer score version 30000001
Fix SDL error on startup caused by setting min/max size before window creation
Add `StringFormatMethod` annotation to `LocalisableString.Format`
Turn on featured artist filter by default and add disclaimer when toggling for the first time
changelog_entries.message: Another step in the direction of promoting featured artist beatmaps and providing new users with better directed access to licenced content. I hope the overhead of clicking through the dialog will not be too bad once per session, but depending on feedback we can consider adding a "don't show again" or similar. This is a personal requirement for pushing osu! out to a new audience (aka mobile). We've made huge progress with the featured artist project and I think making it the default visibility is the right next step.
changelog_entries.message_html:
Another step in the direction of promoting featured artist beatmaps and providing new users with better directed access to licenced content. I hope the overhead of clicking through the dialog will not be too bad once per session, but depending on feedback we can consider adding a "don't show again" or similar.

This is a personal requirement for pushing osu! out to a new audience (aka mobile). We've made huge progress with the featured artist project and I think making it the default visibility is the right next step.

changelog_entries.title: Allow imports from stable on windows to not use extra disk space
changelog_entries.message: A common user request is to "make lazer share a beatmaps directory with stable". This finally realises that goal when both games are on the same drive, using "hard links". You can find more details about how this works at the [explanatory wiki page](https://osu.ppy.sh/wiki/en/Client/Release_stream/Lazer/File_storage#via-hard-links).
changelog_entries.message_html: A common user request is to "make lazer share a beatmaps directory with stable". This finally realises that goal when both games are on the same drive, using "hard links". You can find more details about how this works at the explanatory wiki page.

Add more logging to `SDL2DesktopWindow`
Move away from .NET Standard
Use `LocalisableString`s for date and time formats
Limit SFX panning range on results screen
changelog_entries.message: At least one user reported that the panning effect was too intense, so it is now reduced to match other panning effects.
changelog_entries.message_html: At least one user reported that the panning effect was too intense, so it is now reduced to match other panning effects.

Only show song select for now at UI scale adjust first run screen
changelog_entries.message: Having both was a bit too much. Still not happy with this but it's a bit less sensory overload. I think while it's cool being able to show nested screens like this, it needs more thought to actually be a good experience.
changelog_entries.message_html: Having both was a bit too much. Still not happy with this but it's a bit less sensory overload. I think while it's cool being able to show nested screens like this, it needs more thought to actually be a good experience.

changelog_entries.title: Add argon "pro" skin
changelog_entries.message:
Adds a new argon "pro" skin variant that inherits from "argon".

Initially the only difference will be the new "pro" hitsounds, but this provides a home for potential "pro"-targeting skin modifications in the future.
changelog_entries.message_html:
Adds a new argon "pro" skin variant that inherits from "argon".

Initially the only difference will be the new "pro" hitsounds, but this provides a home for potential "pro"-targeting skin modifications in the future.

Use new ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull throw-helper API
Use new ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull throw-helper API
Fix track changes not updating initial timeline zoom correctly

Fix wiki overlay showing error message when load is cancelled
Don't show "great" or higher judgements when using argon "pro" skin
changelog_entries.message: Done in the easiest-to-implement way for now. I would have liked to use `MaxResult` from the triggering `Judgement` but doing so would come with its own weirdness due to how drawable judgements are pooled. Eventually we will want to move this logic inside `DrawableJudgement` to allow for toggling as a setting, but that will come later.
changelog_entries.message_html: Done in the easiest-to-implement way for now. I would have liked to use MaxResult from the triggering Judgement but doing so would come with its own weirdness due to how drawable judgements are pooled. Eventually we will want to move this logic inside DrawableJudgement to allow for toggling as a setting, but that will come later.

Merry christmas!
changelog_entries.message:
Thanks for spending it with us! I hope you have an enjoyable and relaxing end of year.

We are still hard at work here and hope to get some new surprises out on osu!lazer (aka the ever-looming major update). Stay tuned for more information on that.

Also, as of today you can now attach a message when [gifting a supporter tag](https://osu.ppy.sh/store/products/208)! I know that people enjoy giving supporter as a gift over Christmas so was very happy to finally provide this functionality hopefully in time for some of you to benefit from it.
changelog_entries.message_html:
Thanks for spending it with us! I hope you have an enjoyable and relaxing end of year.

We are still hard at work here and hope to get some new surprises out on osu!lazer (aka the ever-looming major update). Stay tuned for more information on that.

Also, as of today you can now attach a message when gifting a supporter tag! I know that people enjoy giving supporter as a gift over Christmas so was very happy to finally provide this functionality hopefully in time for some of you to benefit from it.

changelog_entries.title: The winter festivities have arrived!
changelog_entries.message:
As the [New Beginnings Art Contest](https://osu.ppy.sh/home/news/2022-11-27-new-beginnings-art-contest) is running this year, we've decided to use a selection of Winter Fanart winners from as far back as 2017 to help keep the seasonal spirit alive.

The menu music is also a throwback to 2017, with ["aureole" by nekodex](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dJf7qiIdltw).

Slightly delay pausing around spinner starts to avoid potential spin rate bug
changelog_entries.message: This aims to fix a long-standing bug that some users inadvertently (or sometimes intentionally) trigger, causing a spinner to spin faster than it should. This change will not be noticeable in any way as it only delays pause internally in very rare cases (within range of a spinner), and only by <150ms at most.
changelog_entries.message_html: This aims to fix a long-standing bug that some users inadvertently (or sometimes intentionally) trigger, causing a spinner to spin faster than it should. This change will not be noticeable in any way as it only delays pause internally in very rare cases (within range of a spinner), and only by <150ms at most.

changelog_entries.message: The two placeholder textures were loaded at startup, even though there's a chance they would never be used. This simplifies the content update flow and also fixes the issue.
changelog_entries.message_html: The two placeholder textures were loaded at startup, even though there's a chance they would never be used. This simplifies the content update flow and also fixes the issue.

changelog_entries.title: Avoid loading overlay headers until first open
Small code quality pass on `SDL2DesktopWindow`
Fix news post images never unloading from memory after first display
Eagerly dispose of triangles intro textures to avoid holding for full length of game session
Fix `NowPlayingOverlay` loading background texture too early (and permanently)
Disable certain beatmap option buttons when there are no beatmaps selected

changelog_entries.title: Initialise BufferedDrawNode FBOs as late as possible
Fix beatmap options test failure due to no beatmap selected
Move "keybindings" keyword to correct section
Fix sliders not correctly taking on full available length after changing curve type
Fix potential incorrect connection state resulting in null reference
Fix entering gameplay while network connection is in a bad state taking too long
Standardise scores to `long` type
Fix triangle button flash effect looking incorrect
Add some debugging for multiplayer test failures
Create "streams" icon
changelog_entries.message: - For future use.
changelog_entries.message_html: • For future use.

changelog_entries.title: Fix timeline potentially scrolling at extents while not dragging
Fix being able to bind two non-modifier keys to the same binding
Add auto-advance support when binding for ruleset key bindings
Refactor and simplify text builder bounds calculation
Display `-` symbol when tracked in-game leaderboard score is below 50
Fix incorrect nullability specific on `ITrackableConfigManager`
Fix "perform from screen" invoking action on non-loaded screens
Fix editor not always playing hitsounds with clock offsets applied
Fix intermittent present beatmap test failures
Catch and gracefully handle file/directory enumeration failures during stable import
When returning to the editor after test play, use the original editor time rather than the point of exit
changelog_entries.message: Matches stable. Felt weird as we had it.
changelog_entries.message_html: Matches stable. Felt weird as we had it.

changelog_entries.title: Fix incorrect rounding of tablet aspect ratio values
Hide scroll speed control from effects section on rulesets which don't support it
Add support for non-square skinned smoke textures
Added "prefer original language metadata" toggle to first-run overlay
Change how leaderboard mod filter works to match web-side implementation
Add winner of Triangles mapping competition as a bundled beatmap

changelog_entries.message_html: https://osu.ppy.sh/home/news/2022-10-06-results-triangles

changelog_entries.title: Rewrite bar graph implementation to use more efficient quads
Avoid crashing when a system audio device provides a `null` name
Realign white line on argon hold note ends to match hit target

changelog_entries.title: Hide spinner ticks / bonus from results screen when not applicable to score
Increase maximum aspect ratio for tablet settings to 23:9 / 2.55
Fix `TestSceneTabletSettings` falling off the bottom of the screen
Add support for storyboards with incorrect path specifications (`\\` instead of `\`)
Fix broken rank graph test
Fix potentially incorrect implementation of double-locking in `Drawable.Scheduler` retrieval
Reduce overhead of audio components until they actually attempt to play a sound
changelog_entries.message: Quite a large reduction in gameplay and song select allocations, should improve load times.
changelog_entries.message_html: Quite a large reduction in gameplay and song select allocations, should improve load times.

changelog_entries.title: Fix osu!mania hold notes occasionally getting in a visually incorrect hit state
Fix displays sometimes not getting updated and failing assertion
Add `Bindable<T>.CopyTo` and use in `GetUnboundCopy` implementation
Add test coverage of input near end of hold note with nearby subsequent note
Change song select to only allow volume adjusting if alt is held while scrolling
Add ability to view recently sent chat messages using up/down arrows
Add back "kiai" time hit animation support in taiko skins
Cleanup `LocalisationManager` and related classes
Refactor `LocaleMapping` lookup to require an exact match to `FrameworkSetting.Locale`
Correctly return `AVERROR_EOF` in `VideoDecoder`
Rearrange osu!catch touch input areas for better ergonomics
Limit how far before the first hitobject that barlines can be generated
changelog_entries.message: - This is intended to fix runaway cases such as https://github.com/ppy/osu/issues/21217.
changelog_entries.message_html: • This is intended to fix runaway cases such as https://github.com/ppy/osu/issues/21217.

changelog_entries.title: Fix crash when hitting 'T' to tap timing while no timing point is selected
Fix chat day separator not being added on pending message resolution
Implement TriangleBorder shader
Add ability to display arbitrary beatmap information in skin layout editor
changelog_entries.message: You can now add beatmap metadata or arbitrary text to your skin layouts (in both song select and gameplay)! This allows for a lot of flexibility and should be a welcome addition for streamers and advanced players that don't want to rely on third-party applications.
changelog_entries.message_html: You can now add beatmap metadata or arbitrary text to your skin layouts (in both song select and gameplay)! This allows for a lot of flexibility and should be a welcome addition for streamers and advanced players that don't want to rely on third-party applications.

changelog_entries.title: Implement TrianglesV2 component
Add ability to seek between control points in editor using down/up arrows
Fix wrong range constrained bindable value transferal in `CopyTo()`
Use source generator for dependency injection
changelog_entries.message: Huge effort to reduce the reflection overheads of systems game-wide. This reduces allocations and CPU usage, especially during load procedures. It's huge, trust me.
changelog_entries.message_html: Huge effort to reduce the reflection overheads of systems game-wide. This reduces allocations and CPU usage, especially during load procedures. It's huge, trust me.

changelog_entries.title: Don't hard crash on incorrect drawable patterns when they wouldn't affect the end user
Move early return conditions away from CircularProgress and CircularBlob shaders
Update most game buttons to use new outlined triangles style
Avoid changing ruleset when presenting a beatmap if it can be converted
Use fully qualified name to ensure uniqueness
Fix incorrect source gen in edge cases of dependency injection
Make all Drawable classes partial
Remove dFdx/dFdy usage in TriangleBorder shader
Compute texel size in the DrawNode of TrianglesV2 component
Simplify resolution of dependency injection candidates
Update dependency injection to use incremental source generation
Improve TrianglesV2 antialiasing
Add missing localization in `DrawableComment`
Adjust search container logic to address game-side issues with hiding its children
Remove unnecessary caching in dependencies tests
Refactor star "DifficultyRangeFilterControl" into generic range slider
Add Roslyn 3.11 source generator package
Add multi target file to source generator package
Remove texture usage in TrianglesV2 component
Ensure currently selected control point always scroll into view
Show mods, ruleset and unicode metadata in "now playing" chat command

changelog_entries.title: Stop requesting messages as part of initial chat presence
changelog_entries.message: No longer necessary with the new websocket-based chat. Reduces network overhead and makes chat load a lot faster.
changelog_entries.message_html: No longer necessary with the new websocket-based chat. Reduces network overhead and makes chat load a lot faster.

changelog_entries.title: Highlight `ChatLine` username on hover
Fix flaky test conditions in `TestSceneReplayDownloadButton`
Attempt to fix flaky `TestHoldForMenuDoesWorkWhenHidden`
Ensure the mouse cursor is hidden when playing osu!catch with relax mod
Update DrawableHitObject state based on entry result during LoadComplete
Fix inconsistent body style inspection
Fix incorrect culture used when parsing timeline popup textbox content
Fix osu!mania editor timeline showing bright-white blueprints
Allow custom rulesets to resolve assets better in the editor
Fix system messages appearing out of order in chat display
Add "kiai" time glow element support
Fix some components not accounting for final hold notes in osu!mania beatmaps
Fix being able to place zero-length spinners
Rework source generator to cache more
Fix first run beatmap screen button colours looking incorrect with new triangle effect
Update framework
Add suffix when exporting replays with same filename to avoid overwriting
Bump `dorny/test-reporter` action to 1.6.0
Fix first-run setup overlay crashing on mobile platforms
Slightly delay pausing around spinner starts to avoid potential spin rate bug
changelog_entries.message: This aims to fix a long-standing bug that some users inadvertently (or sometimes intentionally) trigger, causing a spinner to spin faster than it should. This change will not be noticeable in any way as it only delays pause internally in very rare cases, and only by <100ms at most.
changelog_entries.message_html: This aims to fix a long-standing bug that some users inadvertently (or sometimes intentionally) trigger, causing a spinner to spin faster than it should. This change will not be noticeable in any way as it only delays pause internally in very rare cases, and only by <100ms at most.
